name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node plugin.config.mjs production && node plugin.config.mjs publish
scripts.build:eject: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node plugin.config.mjs production && node plugin.config.mjs publish && node plugin.config.mjs eject
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
